name: Pocket Land
storyline: In Pocket Land, you'll start by cultivating a small plot of land, but as you progress, you'll discover new and exciting features that will help you create your own island paradise. You'll fulfill orders from your customers, who will be delighted with your delicious and fresh produce. Keep an eye on your crops, as they'll be growing continuously, and you'll need to make sure they're healthy and thriving.
summary: Get ready to discover a world full of farming fun, where you can collect and sell crops with just one finger control, upgrade your character, and harvest like a pro.
